yuda aparadha gana eksath janapada senet sabhawata yojanawak woshintan bala giya ihala pele shri lankika rajya thanthrikayan pirisak perala paminimath samaga eksath janapada uththara manthri mandalayata lankawata adala yojanawak. 2014 pebarawari 10 pilika satanin jaya gath swarna pilikawakata erehi wa satan wada jaya gath sammana pujitha sinamawedini swarna mallawarachchi age athdakima gana sandeshaya samaga katha bahaka. 2014 pebarawari 4 'pilika rallak' gana anathuru angawimak lokaya pilika rallakata muhuna pa sitina bawata anathuru angawana loka saukhya sanwidhanaya madhyasara saha sini sambandhayen sima panawima salaka baliya yuthu bawa pawasayi.

pasal 6,500k lama mithuru pasal washayen da thawath pasal 1,000k sandaha mahindodaya thakshanika widyagara da labadenawa.elambaena 2020 wanawita ape rata sitiya yuthu sthanaya sambandhayen ilakka karagena me wadasatahana kriyathmaka wenawa yayi prakasha kaleya.amathi rohitha abegunawardhana, adhyapana niyojya amathi mohan lal greru, pradhana amathiwarun wana sarath eekanayaka, shashindra rajapaksha, dayasiri jayasekara mahathwarun athulu pirisak me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.

in pasu misame wada bharaganna lada athi daksha injineraweku wu ithali jathika 99gara ogastin gallo balma piyathuma]] ewakata thibbotuleda misama ayathwa thibu midellawita misamata pamina wada bhara ganima sidu wimath samagin misam sabhawe nawa udawak sidu wiya.ee anuwa parani dew madura thawath wishala karamin nawikaranaya kirima 1962 mayi masa aarambha karana ladi .ema wadakatayuthu 1970 warshayedi nimakirimata tharam piyathuma daksha wiya.
